function.name: hoodFanSpeedMode_setValue
function.description: This function is used to change the hood fan speed mode.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to change the hood fan speed mode.

predefinedHoodFanSpeedMode.description: The specific mode to set for the hood fan speed.
